title: [大罷課]中大有研究生搞罷課支援！

replies.msg:
事源今日係CU Secrets見到有班研究生話支持罷課
內心感到非常感動，仲有冇人想參加？我就俾左意見，無論你係ＦＭ定最後一年，一齊搞全港大罷課！


(轉自CU Secrets)
知道唔少學生打算新學年罷課，我地一群香港研究生好明白，大家係各方面（特別係成績）有好多顧慮。我地一樣諗緊點樣可以令件事變得更好，幫到罷課既同學。我地只係想俾大家明白，你地唔係自己一個人行緊，而係有好多唔同人同你你地一齊行緊落去。所以，我地係唔同學院既研究生，一齊發起左課外支援小組，希望可以幫到大家。

——————————————————————————————————————
我們是一群香港研究生，為守護香港免受白色恐怖與政治清洗，我們堅決反對逃犯條例修訂，並支持全港學生大罷課行動。反送中運動發展至今，政府非但從未正面回應市民訴求，更任由白色恐怖暴虐，人心惶惶；警察的不當鎮壓，政府的秋後算帳，無不令香港人的人身安全受到威脅，言論與學術自由受到拑制。
學術自由，乃高等教育的基石，政府放肆白色恐怖，逃犯條例修訂後必定會令學術自由大幅收窄，對高等教育帶來莫大損失。回望歷史，各地學者於1988年制定《學術自由和高等學府自主宣言》，宣言訂明，學術研究與人類的基本人權、自由文明有莫大聯繫，任何政權都應保障學術自由免於歧視、政治、或任何恐懼的干預；而《基本法》第27、34及137條，亦明文保障香港學術自由。
反送中運動使香港人權自由走向低谷，每況愈下，面對白色恐怖，學術自由亦將唇亡齒寒。我們明白，覆巢之下無完卵，學術自由並非必然，必須由師生與社會一同守護。故此，我們呼籲我們的學者前輩和師長、香港學界各學科的學人，全球學者一同支持香港學生罷課。
我們承諾，會在2019反送中全港大罷課期間，努力為參與罷課的同學爭取以下數項：

（一）為同學提供課堂筆記、課堂錄音，為需要計算出席率的課堂提供彈性簽到
（二）爭取學系讓參與社運而被捕之的學生，能於服刑後繼續完成學位
（三）爭取學校承諾不追究參與罷課的學生

希望罷課同學匿名提供意見，告訴我們怎樣提供更好的支援：
https://forms.gle/UaLUgsKHveXRFhxu9
如果你希望參與「罷課不罷學」的研究生補習小組，請聯繫我們：
https://forms.gle/jF8eRArv8xd4rcah6

一群香港研究生

We are a group of postgraduate students in Hong Kong. We are determined to oppose the amendment of the extradition law and support the Hong Kong School Strike to keep Hong Kong from white terror and political purge. Since the very beginning of the anti-extradition movement, the government has been avoid answering the demands of the people directly, while allowing every means to suppress and terrorise the people. The police’s excessive crackdowns and the government’s subsequent persecutions pose an acute threat not only to the people’s safety, but also to the freedom of speech and research.

Academic freedom is the foundation stone of higher education. The reign of terror and refusal to withdraw the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance of the Hong Kong Government will undoubtedly compromise the freedom of research and the standing of higher education. The Lima Declaration on Academic Freedom and Autonomy of Institutions of Higher Education drafted in 1988 affirms the interdepence of academic research, basic human rights, freedoms, and civilisation of humankind and asserts that everyny state is obligated to ensure academic freedom from interferences of any source. Similarly, Articles 27, 34, and 137 of the Basic Law also guarantee the academic freedom of Hong Kong.

The anti-extradition bill movement witnesses the downward path of the civil rights and liberties in Hong Kong, which the academic freedom may follow. We cannot isolate from other parts of society. We also understand that we are not merely entitled to academic freedom, but have to sustain it with the efforts of the academic community and society.

Therefore, we urge our academic seniors, teachers, fellows of all academic disciplines from Hong Kong or around the world to support the school strike with us.

In the period of the School Strike, we promise to strive for the following:

Lecture notes, recordings, a flexible sign-in scheme for classes that require attendance as part of the course grade
Continuation and completion of the degreeromise for students who convicted in protests to be allowed to complete their degree after serving their sentence
Promise for students not to be reprimanded for joining the School Strike

If protesting students want to provide suggestions for us anonymously, please visit:
https://forms.gle/UaLUgsKHveXRFhxu9

If you want to join our tutoring group, please visit:
https://forms.gle/jF8eRArv8xd4rcah6

A group of Hong Kong Postgraduate Students"
